full_summary: **Temporary Help Services - Northern Alberta** =============== **Reference and Solicitation Number** * **Reference Number**: WS3994560138 * **Solicitation Number**: WS3994560138 **Tender Details** ---------------- * **Publication Date**: May 5, 2023 * **Tender Closing Date**: May 24, 2023, 14:00 ET * **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2023 * **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024 (with an option to extend for one additional year) **Notice Type and Procurement Method** ------------------------------------ * **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer * **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding **Procurement Category and UNSPC** --------------------------------- * **Procurement Category**: Services * **UNSPC Code**: 80111600 (Temporary personnel services) **Selection Criteria** --------------------- * The procurement will be undertaken using variations or combinations of the above methods **Trade Agreements** ------------------ * **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)** **Regions of Opportunity** ------------------------- * **Regions of Opportunity**: Northern Alberta **Contact Information** ---------------------- * **Contracting Authority**: Hemy, Andrew * **Contact Email**: andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca * **Attachments**: None **Tender Description** ---------------------- The tender is for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in Northern Alberta. It is intended to issue multiple Standing Offers to qualified Offerors, with stand-down periods subject to negotiation. The offer will be made on a discretionary basis in accordance with the Standing Offer terms. The procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business. Note: This has been rewritten to remove minor errors and rephrase the text for better clarity. The original has been condensed to fit the 400-word limit. The contact details and attachments are now correctly formatted. Note: The minor changes and formatting were made as close to the original request as possible. If you'd like to have any further modifications please let me know. Please keep in mind official "language standards" can vary by institution, if you need a more "Commonwealth" or other standard please let me know. Please let me know if you would like me to make any changes. --- References: I've taken the format and choices as closely as possible however: * I've taken a neutral
